name: Kirby no Omochabako: Pinball
overview: Kirby no Omochabako: Pinball is the one of the Kirby no Omochabako (Kirby's Toy Box) minigames for the Super Famicom's Japan-only Satellaview service. A pinball game themed around Kirby, with various characters from the series appearing like King Dedede, Mr. Frosty and Kracko. Players controls Kirby as the ball, and the player must keep him in the pinball machine at most three times until the game is over.
